name: Niels Anne Taatgen
content: Niels Taatgen homepage Niels Taatgen HomeResearchPublicationsPersonal News I am part of the new Cognigron research center that develops neuromorphic computing. PRIMs Information about PRIM/Actransfer, including the paper, supplemental materials, a tutorial and examples models can be found on the PRIMs. The European Research Council has awarded me a 1.4 million Euro starting grant to pursue my research in Multitasking. See the MULTITASK page. Apart from scientific publications, I will comment on the world of multitasking in my Blog Multitasking in the News De Kennis van Nu (televisie & radio) Feburari 2015 Interview of Radio 1 Januari 2013 Volkskrant April 2012 Quest Juni 2012 BreinGeheim Mei 2011 Pavlov, Waarom ben ik zo? Januari 2011 Elsevier Magazine April 2010 Volkskrant 3 July 2010 Esta June 2010 Vrij Nederland July 2010 Quest September 2009 Adam's Appel July 2010 Hoe?Zo! Radio September 2009 Intermediair September 2010 UK Januari 2010 OBA Live (Radio) 29 september 2010 The text of my oratie Pictures of my oratie. "The multitasking mind" is now available at OUP, Amazon and other places: After working at two universities for six years, I have moved back to the University of Groningen, saying goodbye to Carnegie Mellon University. Contact information Prof. dr.
